joplin.title: Joplin @ ADX
joplin.bio: Our first public piano from our first year with our first partner! You can play it when you are at the wonderful ADX facility. Go on in and give it a try! Open during ADX hours.

ellington.title: Ellington @ Martha's
ellington.bio: From 2015 and decorated in homage to the iconic PDX airport carpet, this piano has a smooth, quiet sound.

seeingsound.title: #SeeingSound @ CymaSpace
seeingsound.bio: From 2015: The result of a collaboration with CymaSpace, & Lucid Design, this vintage piano includes sound-reactive visualization electronics that respond to sounds and tones, music becoming light, color and movement.

liszt.title: Liszt @ World Forestry Center
liszt.bio: This piano is uniquely Portland and a must-see work of art.  Decorated by North and in its forever home at the World Forestry Center. Visit and play!

tori.title: Tori  @ Pioneer Place Apple Store
tori.bio: Designed by Megan McGeorge with Tattly tattoos and named for Tori Amos.

wendy.title: Wendy @ Cathedral Park
wendy.bio: This little racoon is out playing under the bridge in beautiful Cathedral Park. Designed by delightful artists at Open Eye Art.

vivian.title: Vivian @ The Children's Museum
vivian.bio: This piano is a whole band! Come out to the Children's Museum to play and bring your friends.

geri.title: Geri @ 8th and East Burnside
geri.bio: One of our most popular locations. Honoring the late Geri Allen and decorated by Doug Fir Lounge.

norah.title: Norah @ Mt. Tabor
norah.bio: Designer Lettie Jane Rennekamp invites you to explore the jungle foliage and find what's hidden in this piano, named for Norah Jones.

carole.title: Carole @ Portland Art Museum
carole.bio: While our pianos are beautiful any time of the day, this masterpeice by Sera Architects reveals a unique talent near the end of the day as the evening comes on. Go play it!
